function getDraw(uint256 drawId) view returns (uint256 id, string drawNumber, uint256 scheduledTime, uint8 status, uint16 winningNumber, uint256 totalBets, uint256 totalAmount, uint256 totalPaidOut)
function getBet(uint256 betId) view returns (address player, uint256 drawId, uint8 betType, uint16 number, uint256 amount, uint256 payout, bool resolved, bool won)
function getDrawBetIds(uint256 drawId, uint256 offset, uint256 limit) view returns (uint256[])
function getNumberExposure(uint256 drawId, uint8 betType, uint16 number) view returns (uint256)
function getMultipliers() view returns (uint32 fijo, uint32 centena, uint32 parle)
function getUserBetIds(address user, uint256 offset, uint256 limit) view returns (uint256[])
function placeBet(uint256 drawId, uint8 betType, uint16 number, uint256 amount) returns (uint256)
function placeBetsBatch(uint256 drawId, tuple(uint8 betType, uint16 number, uint256 amount)[] betInputs) returns (uint256[])
function createDraw(string drawNumber, uint256 scheduledTime) returns (uint256)
function setMultipliers(uint32 fijo, uint32 centena, uint32 parle)
event DrawCreated(uint256 indexed drawId, string drawNumber, uint256 scheduledTime)
event DrawClosed(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 vrfRequestId)
event DrawResolved(uint256 indexed drawId, uint16 winningNumber, uint256 totalPaidOut)
event DrawCancelled(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 refundedAmount)
event BetPlaced(uint256 indexed betId, uint256 indexed drawId, address indexed player, uint8 betType, uint16 number, uint256 amount)
event BetResolved(uint256 indexed betId, address indexed player, bool won, uint256 payout)
event PoolFunded(address indexed from, uint256 amount)
event FeesWithdrawn(address indexed to, uint256 amount)
